name: InSomno
description:
Every 31th of October, tragedy strikes at Horizonte High School: One of the students  is found dead somewhere on the grounds of the high school after committing suicide the night of the 30.

Students call it October Sacrifice.

And what was nothing more than an unpleasant annual event for Nerea ends up turning into a real nightmare. Help her and her friends to find the truth behind that so-called curse.

A game developed for the 3rd Annual Visual Novel Jam by DevTalk.

FEATURES

- Around 16.000 words

- 3 endings

- Zero chill main character

- Nightmares. Probably

CHARACTERS CONTENT WARNING

This game contains depictions of suicide, violence and mild gore.

TEAM

 Idea and script: Eufasy

Art: Tsuki and Eufasy

UI and sound: Pip

Programming: Ctrlmarta

English translation: Ctrlmarta  and Pip

Best team ever! It has been really fun to work with you, guys.
